name: SkateSpace
description:
Ollie, Kickflip, and Grind your way to the highest score possible within a minute! 

Features:

  • An extensive trick system with many tricks added soon
  • Ability to chain tricks in succession to get an even higher score
  • Cosmetic system that doesn't depend on annoying microtransactions

Planned for the future:

  • Global leaderboard to compete for the highest spot
  • 1v1 multiplayer modes 
  • Level  creator to make and share levels
  • Level browser to look through the most popular levels
  • Story mode

SkateSpace ( working title ) is a skateboarding game inspired by the old Tony Hawk pro skater series, is an easy to learn, hard to master systems that require you to test your speed to unlock incredible scores.

In early access! comment any bugs/glitches you find!
